name: LONG
description: LONG is a cryptocurrency memecoin on the Solana blockchain, combining financial optimism with humour. It plays on the term "long", a bullish market position, and features a meme-worthy white Borzoi dog with an exaggeratedly long nose and body. Focused on community, charity, and organic growth, LONG encourages support for causes like animal welfare and promotes the belief that the crypto market should be "Long only" during the bull run.
